Hey, everyone!

As MXroute continues to grow, so do my demands for it as well as the demands of my customers. As the service grows in offerings I expect to have less opportunities to offer such great promotions. It is also possible that the service will see a base price increase by the end of this year. With that said, prices are never raised for existing services.

I invite you all to get in on my latest promo, one that can serve you well for years to come with a very generous amount of storage.

<b>THIS PROMO ENDS JUNE 19</b>

Spring 2016 Special  
40GB Storage  
Unlimited Email Accounts  
Unlimited Domains  
$40 / 2 years (biennially)  
<a href="https://billing.mxroute.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=44">Order Here</a>

Some changes have been made over time, for those familiar with MXroute but maybe not up to date with the latest news:

- OwnCloud support will be removed at the end of 2016. It is no longer advertised.  
- Z-Push support will be removed at the end of 2016. It may be followed by a replacement. As it stands, maintenance for a high volume instance takes away from time better spent working on a new solution.

Some of the features of MXroute:

- Server-side email filters  
- Email forwarding  
- MailChannels for outgoing email  
- POP3 / IMAP / SMTP  
- Roundcube / Squirrelmail / Horde Webmail  
- Backup and download your data at any time  
- cPanel based control

Any questions, feel free to ask :)
